Package HTML.BaseComponents.Element

Class Audio.Builder

java.lang.Object
HTML.BaseComponents.Element.Audio.Builder
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBuilder, ISource
Enclosing class:
Audio
public static class Audio.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBuilder, ISource
Builder class for Audio-tag This class is used to create Audio-objects
